Text.val: 21.12.2009 SH SCR15188 Fixed problem with BXA900.PI.JOURNALNO = 0
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
======= Build directories for TEMPLATES and OUTPUTDIRECTORIES =========
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Switch system language to report language

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Administration number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Client number')&';'&MlsTrans ('ING debtor number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Client debtor number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor name')&';'&MlsTrans ('Country code')&';'&MlsTrans ('Invoice number')

Trim ({0,25})&';'&MlsTrans ('Invoice amount invoice curr.')&';'&MlsTrans ('Invoice date')&';'&MlsTrans ('Due date')&';'&MlsTrans ('Date from')&';'&MlsTrans ('Date until')&';'&MlsTrans ('Financed amount')&';'&MlsTrans ('Base amount')&';'&MlsTrans ('Charged previous month')
Trim ({0,25})&';'&MlsTrans ('Charged this month')&';'&MlsTrans ('Charged EOM')&';'&MlsTrans ('Days')&';'&MlsTrans ('Percentage')&';'&MlsTrans ('Invoices at admno')&';'&MlsTrans ('Invoices at clntno')
